description: Deletes tags from an Amazon Web Services PCS resource. To delete a tag, specify the tag key and the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Web Services PCS resource.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.

parameters.name: tagKeys
parameters.description: 1 or more tag keys to remove from the resource. Specify only tag keys and not tag values. (string) ---
